definitions: To offer guidance or moral instruction to others while failing to follow that same guidance in one's own life.
examples: He is a hypocrite who gives advice to others but makes the same mistakes himself.
It is easy to give advice to others but make the same mistakes themselves when facing real pressure.
lemma: give advice to others but make the same mistakes themselves
synonyms: do as I say, not as I do
the cobbler's children have no shoes
source: give advice to others but make the same mistakes themselves
